response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe is worth more than $1,200,000 to you. My initial offer for this exceptional item is $1,500,000. This generous proposal allows for a 25% premium over its perceived value to you, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please consider this offer carefully and let me know if you wish to proceed. I am confident that together we can make this a successful deal.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1500000}
